title: Remember When: A death metal band played on The Erin Simpson Show
content:encoded:
If you thought Erin Simpson's theme tune was rocking, wait till you hear this. Join Alex and Duncan as they look back at a very special 2010 episode of The Erin Simpson Show, in which a Christchurch death metal band played to a mosh pit of children on the after school kids' show.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
